title: Entertainment Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of movies, TV shows, music, and pop culture.

questions.question: Which film won the Academy Award for Best Picture in 2020?
options: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
questions.explanation: Parasite, directed by Bong Joon-ho, became the first non-English language film to win the Academy Award for Best Picture in 2020.

questions.question: Who played the character of Tony Stark/Iron Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
questions.explanation: Robert Downey Jr. portrayed Tony Stark/Iron Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe from 2008 to 2019.

questions.question: Which band released the album 'Abbey Road'?
questions.explanation: Abbey Road was the eleventh studio album by the English rock band The Beatles, released in 1969.

questions.question: Which TV series features characters named Walter White and Jesse Pinkman?
questions.explanation: Breaking Bad is an American neo-Western crime drama television series that featured Walter White (played by Bryan Cranston) and Jesse Pinkman (played by Aaron Paul).

questions.question: Who is the author of the Harry Potter book series?
questions.explanation: J.K. Rowling is the author of the Harry Potter fantasy series, which has become one of the best-selling book series in history.

questions.question: Which artist painted 'Starry Night'?
questions.explanation: Starry Night is an oil on canvas painting by the Dutch post-impressionist painter Vincent van Gogh, painted in June 1889.

questions.question: Which of these is NOT one of the Friends characters?
questions.explanation: Mike Hannigan (played by Paul Rudd) was Phoebe's boyfriend and later husband, but not one of the six main Friends characters.

questions.question: Who directed the film 'Jurassic Park'?
questions.explanation: Jurassic Park is a 1993 American science fiction adventure film directed by Steven Spielberg.

questions.question: Which singer has the nickname 'The Queen of Pop'?
questions.explanation: Madonna is often referred to as 'The Queen of Pop' and is considered one of the most influential figures in popular culture.

questions.question: Which video game franchise features a character named Master Chief?
questions.explanation: Master Chief is the main protagonist and playable character in the Halo video game franchise developed by Bungie and 343 Industries.
